content:
Grouping is a one-dimension aggregation of resources. This makes the Artifact list a one-dimension list.
Would be nice to have something more like the Resource list in the FHIR spec which is categorized, alphabetical,...

Is this something that can be considered? I am not sure how, possibly adding some structure to ImplementationGuide.grouping... (and a bit of xslt)
Example: I would like to have resources in my IG grouped by project, or by committee, or by category...
